description: Human tissue plasminogen activator, purified, glycosylated, 527 residues purified from CHO cells
doseSchedule: 2.2 mg/2mL Injection, powder, lyophilized, for solution form with intravenous route
mechanismOfAction: Alteplase binds to fibrin rich clots via the fibronectin finger-like domain and the Kringle 2 domain. The protease domain then cleaves the Arg/Val bond in plasminogen to form plasmin. Plasmin in turn degrades the fibrin matrix of the thrombus, thereby exerting its thrombolytic action.
name: Alteplase
